name: GIST Appendix N
title: Clinical and Pathological N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in metastasis.

**Note 2:**  Superior and inferior mesenteric nodes are coded in distant metastasis.  Mesenteric nodes, NOS are coded in regional lymph nodes. Mesenteric nodes, NOS are coded in regional lymph nodes.

**Note 3:**  Regional lymph node involvement is rare for GISTs, so that cases in which the nodal status is not associated clinically or pathologically could be considered N0 instead of cNX or pNX.

**Regional lymph nodes for appendix:**

    Celiac
        Anterior (prececal)
        Ileocolic
        Posterior (retrocecal)
        Right colic
    Colic, NOS
    Epicolic (adjacent to bowel wall)
    Mesenteric, NOS
    Mesocolic, NOS
    Paracolic/pericolic
footnotes: *NX is not defined in AJCC 7th edition
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed*

Unknown; regional lymph nodes not stated
Not documented in patient record

Regional lymph nodes, NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
